DiscountPercentage.title: DiscountPercentage
DiscountPercentage.description: Discount Percentage that should be applied to the QuoteLineItem. The input should be a number until 2 decimal. Maximum value can be 100

QuoteID.title: QuoteID
QuoteID.description: 18 digit ID of the Quote record

QuoteLineItem.title: QuoteLineItem
QuoteLineItem.description: 18 digit ID of the QuoteLineItem record
